channel.title: yacc on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in yacc on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] I tried to make an original language PPAPScript which imaged PPAP (pen pineapple appo pen) in Python
item.description: Yesterday (6th day) [seiketkm](http://qiita.com/seiketkm)'s"[IdevelopedanapplicationforRobophonethatcamefromthefuture](http://qiita.com/seiketkm/items/46992f933294a7668dba)". This article is the 7th day of Tech-Circle Hands on Advent Calendar 2016. This time I would like to create an original language using PLY(lex+yacc), which is a lexical analyzer/parser library of Python. Speaking of the original language, TrumpScript, a programming language that imaged Donald Trump, was released before. https://github.com/samshadwell/TrumpScript TrumpScript has the following features. Floating point type cannot be used, only integers. The United States is not halfway.
